rules.1: Before place a plastic object, compressible object should be in the box before. However, if there is no compressible object, place it.
rules.2: Don't push or fold plastic object.
rules.3: If there is any foldable object, fold it before place it in the box
rules.4: Only push compressible objects after placing items in the bin.

bin_packing.goals: Pack all the objects except the foldable ones.
